content: i created this pattern while wondering what my big sister would like to wear something soft something simple and yet classy but the most important part something shiny it s fluffy it s light and warm it s super soft it s a crown for everyday brioche beginners friendly there s two sizes s and m feel free to adapt to have your perfect size the gauge isn t crucial for this project keep in mind that i m a tight knitter if you can t meet the gauge while the lurex thread isn t crucial at all it adds its thing to the whole project you will only need one skein of fingering or sport yarn and less than half a skein of mohair you can also use a dk yarn and mohair it ll be more squishy
